TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadDataCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadDataCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks При создании делегата необходимо указать метод, обрабатывающий событие.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Чтобы связать событие с обработчиком событий, нужно добавить в событие экземпляр делегата.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Обработчик событий вызывается всякий раз, когда происходит событие, если делегат не удален.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Дополнительные сведения о делегатах обработчиков событий см. в разделе [обработка и вызов событий](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples В следующем примере кода демонстрируется асинхронная выгрузка данных.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading data. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#34)] Следующий метод вызывается после завершения передачи.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#35)]
